main.description: I love solving complex problems in innovative and creative ways, and I am currently seeking to join a team that is collaborative and passionate about their work
main.bio: I keep learning every day and continue to be driven to further understand and apply my knowledge across as many digital canvases as I can. The ability to constantly be learning and developing new skills is an important factor in my passion for development, and I would love to bring this enthusiasm to you. P.S I love almost anything under the sun, apart from Real Madrid and slow wifi.
main.contactmessage: If you're interested in chatting or want more information about what I've been working on, I'd love to hear from you!

education.description: Programing Fundamentals, Product Development, Front-end Web Development, Back-End Web Development and Team Collaboration Strategies

work.title: Technology Consultant/Key Account Manager
work.description: Focus on developing new business for a software development/digital agency. Responsible for contract negotiations ($1 million+). Day-to day relationship of enterprise accounts.
work.description2: Project: Travel booking web/mobile application for Bank Of Montreal customers.  Coordinating scoping, technical support, UAT and live deployments of various features for the web application. Team consisted of UX, Project Delivery, Developers, Product and Upper Management.

work.title: Cloud Consultant/ Sales Manager
work.description: Focus on consulting managed cloud services, CDN and hosting to various dev shops in North America. Ecritel was a direct competion to AWS and Rackspace - with value prop of fastest cloud in Canada with global infrasctructure. Also, reperesented company at various trade shows in North America.
